name: Invalid Email Address Message
help_text: This message is shown if the email address is a non-valid email address.

name: Password Mismatch Message
help_text: This message is shown if the password and password confirmation do not match.

name: Domain Validation Message
help_text: This message is shown if email fails the domain validation.

name: Enable Generic Email Validation
help_text: Enables validation to prevent invalid email addresses

name: Enable Password Match Validation
help_text: Enables validation to prevent invalid password confirmation match

name: Enable Email Domain Validation
help_text: Enables validation to prevent email addresses that are not from a specific domain.

name: Email Domain Validation Value
help_text: Enables validation to prevent invalid email addresses
